name: modapp-resource
description: Utility classes implementing modapp's resource interfaces for Models and Collections.

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:commonjs && npm run build:es && npm run build:umd && npm run build:umd:min
scripts.build:umd: cross-env BABEL_ENV=es NODE_ENV=development node_modules/.bin/rollup src/index.js --config --sourcemap --file dist/modapp-resource.js
scripts.build:umd:min: cross-env BABEL_ENV=es NODE_ENV=production rollup src/index.js --config --file dist/modapp-resource.min.js
scripts.test: npm run eslint && npm run jest
